name: SchücoBuildingSkinControl
0:
”Alexa begin Schuco”
”which elements do I have”
”open window”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: schuco
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Schüco BSC Skill, it is possible to control Schüco TipTronic SimplySmart windows, ASE 60/80 TipTronic and DriveTec elements with voice control.
Simply download the skill and perform the following setup steps.
Elements can be moved or the status of the elements can be retrieved.
Please note that a Schüco Automation Manager and IP Gateway are required to use the service.


safety instructions
The product described here is a service provided through the Amazon Web Service (AWS). Voice control using the Amazon Echo device series does not have voice authentication. The Schüco BSC Skill has an optional password query. If you do not use the password query option, please ensure that the system is protected against unauthorised access by third parties. If you use the password assignment option in Schüco BSC Skill, make sure that the password does not fall into the hands of third parties. 

 
Setup

1. register with the Schüco Cloud if you do not already have an account. You can reach them at www.schueco-operation-dashboard.com. If you already have an account, continue with step 2.

2. activate the Schüco BSC Skill. After activating the skill, you will be directed to the Schüco Cloud login page on your smartphone. Please enter your login data here with which you are logged in to the cloud. 

Your Schüco windows and sliding systems are now linked to your Echo device. 
 
4.You can now optionally assign a security password in the Schüco Operation Dashboard under Settings. Your echo device will ask you for this password for every run command before the command is executed. Please note our safety instructions in this description.
